name: M5Stack Module Template
description: PCB template for M5Stack expansion modules with M-BUS connectors. This template provides a board outline matching M5Stack module dimensions with correctly placed connectors for M5Stack Core alignment. All IO pins on the M5Stack are accessible through M-BUS headers.
author: BotanicFields, Inc.

features: M-BUS pin headers with standard KiCad library pinout
Optional board notch for controller compatibility
